minutes.speaker: Arjun Vasanth
minutes.text: I know you're all concerned about the long hours I've been putting in...

minutes.speaker: Dr. Krishnan Vasanth
minutes.text: Banking was stable. What happens to our home loan and savings if this doesn't work out?

minutes.speaker: Meera Vasanth
minutes.text: What about our savings?. You've been working 80-hour weeks for months. This is affecting your health and our relationship.

minutes.speaker: Lakshmi Vasanth
minutes.text: You look tired. You've been working 80-hour weeks for months. This is affecting your health and our relationship.

minutes.speaker: Arjun Vasanth
minutes.text: I know the long hours are affecting us, but this round is critical for our future.

minutes.speaker: Lakshmi Vasanth
minutes.text: Your health is more important. What happens to our home loan and savings if this doesn't work out?

minutes.speaker: Arjun Vasanth
minutes.text: I know the long hours are affecting us, but this round is critical for our future.

minutes.speaker: Meera Vasanth
minutes.text: Can you take a break this weekend?. You've been working 80-hour weeks for months. This is affecting your health and our relationship.

minutes.speaker: Arjun Vasanth
minutes.text: I'm trying to balance everything, but the investor meetings are crucial right now.

minutes.speaker: Lakshmi Vasanth
minutes.text: Your health is more important. I'm worried about the stress you're under. Can you at least take Sundays off?

action_items.task: Set boundaries for work hours and family time
